general.loggingLevel: INFO // TRACE | DEBUG | INFO | WARN | ERROR

site.name: string, human-readable site name
site.baseUrl: string, base URL for making absolute URLs
site.httpTimeout: integer, HTTP request timeout in milliseconds (default: 30000)
site.httpUserAgent: string, User-Agent string for HTTP requests

runtime.memoryThreshold: number, memory threshold (0.1-1.0) for memory check
runtime.maxRetries: integer, maximum retry attempts for failed requests

labeler.maxSentenceLengthForContext: integer, max sentence length before context extraction (default: 200)
labeler.minLanguageRatio: number, min % of target language chars 0.0-1.0 (default: 0.3)
labeler.maxSpecialCharRatio: number, max % of special chars allowed 0.0-1.0 (default: 0.2)
dictionaryPaths: array, list of dictionary JSON file paths

forums.url: string, complete URL to forum section
forums.path: string, storage path category (fresh_water, salt_water, etc.)
forums.forumType: string, forum engine type (PHPBB or VBULLETIN)
forums.language: string, content language (RU, EN, or HE)
